entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cant start generated program on linux (Ubuntu) #63267
  • Publishing a NativeAOT app generates JSON files #63265
  • False positive trim analysis warning despite [DynamicallyAccessedMembers] when using iterator method #63264

Closed

  • Different codegen for ThrowHelper calls with and w/o MethodImplOptions.NoInlining option in .NET6 #63266
  • Strange RegEx performance in .NET 5 #62902

PullRequests

Created

  • Preserve `OBJ`/`BLK` on the RHS of `ASG` #63268
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Link the aot profiler into dotnet.wasm by default in deb… #63262
    area-Build-mono
  • Use SAL2 _In_, _Out_ to prevent conflicts. #63261
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [mono][wasm] Remove unused targets from wasm/Makefile. #63263
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix stack overflow with X509Certificate FriendlyName #63179
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1532008 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • add capture group name in comment #63255
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Compress operand kinds array and optimize `OperIsLocal` #63253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Allow methods with finally clauses to be AOTed. #63065
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add some diagnostics for EFS tests #63243
    area-System.IO
